articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction, as the semi-finals of the Champions League begin on Tuesday evening, plus reaction to Leicester's title win at Preston.
articles.title: Football latest news, Champions League build-up & Championship reaction

articles.description: The United States and Mexico withdraw their joint bid to host the 2027 Women's World Cup to focus on bidding for the tournament in 2031.
articles.title: 2027 Women's World Cup: USA & Mexico withdraw bid

articles.description: US athletes write to the country’s drug tsar asking for a “truly independent investigation” into 23 Chinese swimmers who competed at the Tokyo Games despite testing positive for a banned drug.
articles.title: Wada: US athletes call for 'truly independent investigation' into Chinese swimmers' failed tests

articles.description: Champions League: Schalke, relegation and oblivion
articles.title: Champions League: Schalke, relegation and oblivion

articles.description: Fast bowler Jofra Archer returns to England's squad for the T20 World Cup in June after more than a year out with injuries.
articles.title: Jofra Archer returns to England squad for T20 World Cup in June

articles.description: Former England lock Geoff Parling says coaching against the British and Irish Lions will be a “unique experience” that he “can’t play down.”
articles.title: Geoff Parling: Ex-England lock 'excited' at facing British and Irish Lions

articles.description: Mohamed Salah was "out of order" for arguing with Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp on the touchline at West Ham, says Chris Sutton.
articles.title: Liverpool: Mohamed Salah 'out of order' in Jurgen Klopp clash

articles.description: With 700 Real Madrid games and 39 titles between them, BBC Sport's Andy West explains why Lucas Vazquez and Nacho deserve more praise.
articles.title: Lucas Vazquez & Nacho: Real Madrid's unsung heroes ready to be called on again

articles.description: Heavyweight boxer Francis Ngannou's 18-month-old son passes away.
articles.title: Francis Ngannou: Young son of boxer and former UFC champion dies

articles.description: BBC Sport's F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions before the sixth race of the season - the Miami Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Newey, Hamilton & McLaren - Andrew Benson answers your questions
